scripts.dev: npm run build --workspace @math-duel/shared && concurrently -n shared,server,client -c cyan,green,magenta "npm run dev --workspace @math-duel/shared" "npm run dev --workspace @math-duel/server" "npm run dev --workspace @math-duel/client"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @math-duel/shared && npm run build --workspace @math-duel/server && npm run build --workspace @math-duel/client
scripts.test: npm run build --workspace @math-duel/shared && npm run test --workspace @math-duel/server && npm run test --workspace @math-duel/client
scripts.test:watch: npm run build --workspace @math-duel/shared && concurrently -n server,client -c green,magenta "npm run test:watch --workspace @math-duel/server" "npm run test:watch --workspace @math-duel/client"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build --workspace @math-duel/shared && npm run test:coverage --workspace @math-duel/server && npm run test:coverage --workspace @math-duel/client
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
